attributes.action: Stop Hate Preacher Anjem Choudary Getting A Safe House & Benefits
attributes.background: He's A Preacher Of Hate Against The Good Christian People Of Britain. Why The Hell Should Us Tax Payers Fund His Life

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the licence conditions that Anjem Choudary was released under are not set by the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to change the law so that people convicted of terrorism-related offences cannot receive benefits if that is something you would like to see happen.
